GET /api.description: serves the description of all the endpoints including example requests, responses, and queries

GET /api/topics.description: serves all topics with there slug and description

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: serves all articles with no article body and with comment count

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article with the corresponding id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/article/:article_id/comments.description: adds comment to the article matching the article_id and serves the comment on the response

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments or decrements the votes on an article and serves the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comments if user has permission to delete, serves nothing
